post_install: $scoopPathBin = scoop which scoop; $scoopPathDir = $scoopPathBin -replace [regex]::Escape('\scoop\current\bin\scoop.ps1'), ''; $scoopPathDirFull = $scoopPathDir -replace '^~', [System.Environment]::GetFolderPath('UserProfile'); $shortcutPath = Join-Path $env:USERPROFILE 'AppData\Roaming\Microsoft\Windows\Start Menu\Programs\Scoop Apps\Gamename.lnk'; $iconPath = Join-Path $scoopPathDirFull '\manifestname\current\icon.ico'; $shell = New-Object -ComObject WScript.Shell; $shortcut = $shell.CreateShortcut($shortcutPath); $shortcut.IconLocation = $iconPath; $shortcut.Save()
